summary: Displays a notification when the shout is ready, or on failed shout, how long the cooldown still lasts. Mainly for use with disabled shout meter (for example with iHud).
descriptionHtml:
Displays a notification when the shout is ready, or on failed shout, how long the cooldown still lasts. Mainly for use with disabled shout meter (for example with iHud).

The notifications read: "Shout ready" and "Ready in: x seconds" (with x being the seconds remaining, as a full number)

If you want any other text, or just one of the messages, or have any other request, i'd be happy to help :D
(on request i could make a version with iHud, that displays the shout-meter for a short while, when trying to shout, but the game makes it pulse when that happens, so it's really hard to read)
author: maxiking50
